comments.body:
I am generally +1 but there is already an option in ansible.cfg `roles_path` and I would suggest to reuse it and also implement a `roles_requirements_file` (default: requirements.yml) as well globally.

Alternatively they can be passed in every play as suggested.

Lines 40 and 41 discuss the configuration options. 

`roles_path` is fine for this purpose as long as `roles_path` can be relative to the playbook being run. I'm not sure if that's the case right now.
